name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Don't get too excited. The Sitong Bridge incident only showed personal courage, and it doesn't represent anything.
I don't think this will cause a chain reaction. Just now, someone posted these pictures in an anti-thief group inside the wall and was immediately condemned by everyone because everyone didn't want their WeChat accounts to be blocked.
In fact, I think that if someone has stood up for you and you don't even dare to lend a hand, then you really don't deserve this freedom.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
But I can't say these people are wrong, because they do face such fear, which is deeply rooted in people's hearts and is very real.
I think everyone should know that every time you experience something, your silence will tighten the shackles on you, so it has come to this point today.
You don't need to stand up yourself, you just need to let more people know that someone has actually stood up, that's all, it won't get worse.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: There is no point in making a scene on Twitter. Tomorrow when you wake up, you will still have to do nucleic acid testing, you will still have to go to the quarantine center, and you will still have to study. You come here to watch the fun, but it will not change your life. In fact, I think you may be more miserable because you know what it is like outside, but your body is still inside.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
I have been saying why people inside the wall don't fight back, and I hope they won't die. But they really fight back, and you suddenly find that your account, which you have used for several years, is very valuable.
You don't need to do anything, but you tighten the chains on yourself, fearing that blood will splash on you.
So what can we do? Let's continue to welcome the 20th National Congress.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Why did Iran have a protest just because of a headscarf? Because people can't accept it.
To put it bluntly, whether it is re-election or a more stringent zero-lockdown, the essence is that the Chinese can accept it all.
So as a person living overseas, it is difficult to say anything.
In the future, I will continue to focus on individual suffering and help ordinary people speak out.
But what do you want to change? You Chinese should work hard on yourselves.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: My waist hurts so much. Do you know that I have blown up 54 accounts on Weibo? The shortest time is 14 minutes to blow up one. In order to prevent me from reincarnating, even my ID has been blown up to a sensitive word. There is nothing to say. Your choice is your life. To endure or to keep up with the pace and exert a little effort, it is your life that determines it. I am not the one who does nucleic acid twice a day.
